item.title: Asia Pacific is dominated by formal severance policies, according to Right Management
item.description:
Right Management, a global outplacement firm, found that companies in Asia Pacific, especially in Japan (94%) and China (92%), are more likely to have formal severance policies. According to their global report, “Severance Practices Around the World,” 75% of surveyed companies globally have formal, written severance policies, while 32% rely on informal, unwritten policies, or general practices. Source: Right Management. Click here to view the full infographic. Within Asia Pacific, 82% of companies reported having a formal policy, compared to around 70% in both the Americas and Europe...

item.description:
